name: Starship ~ Game [BETA]
description:
Starship ~The Game [BETA] 

Huge thanks to @griffpatch for his tutorial, try it it's epic! 

So, as the tittle says, this game is in BETA, so I'll be adding & fixing things on the future. This took me a day, so if you appreciate my hard work on it, please, remember to love, fave & follow! 

Lag? Don't play on fullscreen, spam green flag & before clicking on the play buttom, select your skin. Or, play on turbowarp: https://turbowarp.org/553988516 If it doesn't works even on turbowarp, reload the page until it works!

Instructions: 

~Move with w,a,s,d 

~Shoot with space bar 

~Kill lemons! 

~Coment your score!

 Credits: 

~Thanks to @griffpatch for tutorial, try it, it's epik! 

~Thanks to @-Xaf- for inspiration. 

~Songs are Starship by @-Xaf- & Spaceship by Lesbion X 

~Thanks to @-Xaf- for some player art :O 

If I forgotten to credit someone, tell me! 

Else by me
